column1: ZW3104 Enbrighten GE 28167 Plug-in 1-Outlet Smart Dimmer

column4: 1. Original Release Firmware (OTA file not released due to lack of support for Adesto flash in newer hardware)
1. Modified the button press process to change the LED status
column5: 2. Modified the value to 2 for the parameter #8, #10 and #12
column6: 3. Modified the asscoation to 3 groups (5 node each group)
column7: 4. Added Instantaneous Reports CC, Scene Activation CC and Scene Actuator CC
column8: 5. Modified the button press process for association group 2 and 3
column9: 6. Modified the lifeline assocation group, 5 node will send singlecast message when the devicereset locally
column12: 9. Modified some command classes to support both security and non-security network
column13: 10. Updated the multilevel command class to version 2
column15: 12. Modify the default status for LED

column6: 3. Added button press process to enter switch mode
column9: 6. Fixed the dimming duration for command class Switch Multilevel Set
